prod_short_desc: Keep the crooks from escaping with the gold bars!
prod_long_desc:
Pick up your badge and join the LEGO® City Mountain Police officers as they investigate the Mountain River Heist! This entertaining toy for boys and girls features a police seaplane with spinning propeller, opening minifigure cockpit and aimable net shooter, armored truck with space for a pallet, a small amphibious vehicle with chain and hook, plus a falling tree with beehive. Includes 4 minifigures.
Includes 4 minifigures: a police pilot, security officer and 2 crooks.
Features a police seaplane with spinning propeller, opening minifigure cockpit and aimable net shooter, armored truck with opening back doors, plus a small amphibious vehicle with chain and hook.
Also includes a falling tree with beehive.
Cut the tree to stop the money transport.
Hook the chain around the pallet to steal the golden plates and bars.
Spin the propeller on the seaplane to take off.
Push the lever on the back of the net shooter to fire the net at the amphibious vehicle.
Accessory elements include a chainsaw, 4 golden plates, 2 golden bars, handcuffs, string net, crowbar and a buildable pallet.
This fun toy for boys and girls is suitable for ages 5-12.
Police seaplane measures over 3” high, 7” long and 8” wide.
Armored truck measures over 2” high, 5” long and 1” wide.
Crooks' amphibious vehicle measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
Fallen tree measures over 3” high, 4” wide and 1” long.
